product_name: Mountain Hardwear Super Chockstone Jacket - Men's
long_description: You can squeeze through tight cracks in the rugged Mountain Hardwear Super Chockstone Jacket for men. This stretchy hooded soft shell is water resistant, lightweight and built for a beating. Chockstone(TM) double-weave soft-shell fabric is durable, breathable and wind resistant; offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Durable water repellent finish sheds light precipitation. Low-profile hood offers a snug fit. Zippered hand pockets and single chest pocket. Adjustable hem seals in warmth. Mountain Hardwear Super Chockstone Jacket for men layers well over a base layer and under a shell for spring and fall climbing conditions.
short_description: You can squeeze through tight cracks in the rugged Mountain Hardwear Super Chockstone Jacket for men. This stretchy hooded soft shell is water resistant, lightweight and built for a beating.
